travel_title: Travel Rights at Airports and Borders
travel_tsa1: You have the right to refuse a full-body scan and opt for a pat-down instead
travel_tsa2: TSA cannot detain you without reasonable suspicion
travel_tsa3: You can request a private screening if you're uncomfortable with the public process
travel_tsa4: TSA cannot search the contents of your phone or laptop without a warrant
police_complaints_text: If you believe your rights were violated, you can file a complaint against the officer(s) involved. You can usually do this through the police department's internal affairs division or a civilian oversight board. Gather details like officer names, badge numbers, patrol car numbers, witness information, and specific events.
